General.Name: Lampsa Hellenic Hotels S.A
General.Description: Lampsa Hellenic Hotels S.A. operates hotels primarily in Greece, Cyprus, and Serbia. The company operates the Hotel Grande Bretagne located in Athens; the King George hotel with 59 rooms and 43 suites in Athens; and the Sheraton Rhodes Resort, which comprises 401 guestrooms situated on the island of Rhodes. It also operates the Hyatt Regency Hotel that includes 301 luxury rooms, suites, and facilities for recreation and dining located in Belgrade; the Hotel Excelsior, which has 76 rooms, 2 junior suites, a banquet area, and a restaurant located in Belgrade; and Athens Capital Hotel in Greece. Lampsa Hellenic Hotels S.A. was founded in 1919 and is based in Athens, Greece.
